subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Lorena Ochoa shot a five-under-par 68 to hold off Suzann Pettersen by a stroke in a dramatic final round and win the Corona Championship for the second straight year in Morelia, Mexico. Ochoa, who also won the event in 2006, had back-to-back birdies on the 15th and 16th holes to break a tie with Pettersen. ¶Jerry Kelly rallied with two birdies on the back nine to win the Zurich Classic in Avondale, La. He finished a stroke ahead of Charles Howell III, Rory Sabbatini and Charlie Wi. It was the 42-year-old Kelly’s first PGA Tour title since he won two in 2002. ¶Tom Lehman made a par putt on the second playoff hole to become the 13th player to win his Champions Tour debut, teaming with Bernhard Langer to beat Craig Stadler and Jeff Sluman in the Liberty Mutual Legends of Golf in Savannah, Ga. Each team finished at 27-under 189 in the better-ball event. (AP).
